name: Infernoble Knight Ogier
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 FIRE Warrior monster or 1 "Noble Arms" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Infernoble Knight Ogier". If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Warrior monster you control; equip this card to that target you control. You can only use these effects of "Infernoble Knight Ogier" once per turn. A monster equipped with this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.
